data: `minecraft:behavior.raid_garden` allows an entity to eat crops that have been planted in a farm.

data.Name: blocks
data.Description: Blocks that the mob is looking for to eat/raid

data.Name: eat_delay
data.Description: Time in seconds between each time it eats/raids

data.Name: full_delay
data.Description: Amount of time in seconds before this mob wants to eat/raid again after eating its maximum

data.Name: goal_radius
data.Description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot

data.Name: initial_eat_delay
data.Description: Time in seconds before starting to eat/raid once it arrives at it

data.Name: max_to_eat
data.Description: Maximum number of crops this entity wants to eat/raid. If set to zero or less then it doesn't have a maximum

data.Name: search_range
data.Description: Distance in blocks the mob will look for crops to eat

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
